Title: Product Test II
Objectives: Determine the acceptance levels of 2 revised True 2 mg. 100's non-menthol product candidates versus Now. Proceed to market this product if it achieves the action standard: at parity or better versus Now among female Now smokers, aged 35-55.

ResearchDesign.Description: This is a two cell test with a sample size of 300 (150 per cell). Only 100mm Now smokers who are female and between 35 and 55 years of age will qualify.
ResearchDesign.TestDetails: Each smoker will test 4 packs of one of the prototype True 2 mg. products and 4 packs of Now.
